Geneva, Switzerland247 contributions

Beautiful building full of chattery women

It’s a truly beautiful building in the old town of Bern, and overall the
experience was a good one (although you’d be hard pressed to make it last
longer than two hours). One circuit takes about 60 minutes or so.  
  
But, and it’s a but that is all too common with too many spa retreats, and
that is that all of the notices asking for peace and quiet are largely ignored
by large groups of women sat around chatting as if it was a coffee shop or
hair salon rather than a relaxing, spa. My attempts to relax were completely
overwhelmed by their chatter. Can’t they keep quiet for even 20-30 minutes?!!  
  
Disappointed.

Best Massage I've had in a long while

We both had amazing 2 hour massages here! The pressure was deep and it helped
with our 2 week travel vacation. We had Niyom and Lumpai and they were
excellent. This place is a must if your feet are sore from walking or if your
neck and back is aching from hotel beds! Thank you so much for our excellent
massages!
